entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
